cause.description:
This cause is to spread the support of our soldiers, sailors, airmen, and Marines currently fighting over in Irag and Afghanistan. I don't care whether you support Bush or not, the only kind of people I want in this group are die hard, red-blooded, patriotic Americans.
1. Support For Our Troops
cause.mission: collect and send gifts, letters to the soldiers, sailors, airmen, and Marines over in the Middle East.
cause.name: Support Our Troops
